sources.title: 1939 Verdacht Auf Ursula( Grethe Weiser, Viktor Staal, Fritz Kampers, Hans Junkermann, Käthe Haack, Fritz Genschow)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1939. Verdacht auf Ursula  u.a mit Viktor Staal und Grethe Weiser

metadata.Plot: The sawmill owner Ramin disappears from one day to the next. Concerned, his family learns from the bank that he wrote a check to an agent named Frisch. He supposedly wanted to use it to buy a good. However, that did not happen. Wh...
metadata.Actors: Luli Deste, Anneliese Uhlig, Viktor Staal
